Room.Name: Necropolis Avenue/Netherworld Lane Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Netherworld Lane and Necropolis Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: Necropolis Avenue runs south directly into the Main Entrance of the Necropolis, which is probably why it is named that way. Netherworld Lane continues to the east and west, making the north border of the Necropolis. The Necropolis is surrounded by iron bars. The only entrance is to the south.
